title_translation.en: How Autonomous Vehicles Will Change Transport
title_translation.bn: рж╕рзНржмрж╛ржпрж╝рждрзНрждрж╢рж╛рж╕рж┐ржд ржпрж╛ржиржмрж╛рж╣ржи ржХрзАржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржкрж░рж┐ржмрж╣ржи ржмрзНржпржмрж╕рзНржерж╛ ржкрж░рж┐ржмрж░рзНрждржи ржХрж░ржмрзЗ

content_translation.en:
**Autonomous vehicles** are one of the most **disruptive** innovations of modern **automation** technology, which can bring radical changes to the **transport** system. These are operated through **algorithmic** systems, where there is no need for human **cognitive** decision-making.

Currently, traffic jams and **congestion** are one of the biggest **impediments** in cities, reducing **efficiency**. However, **autonomous vehicles** can reduce this problem through **optimization** and improvement of **logistics** systems.

It will also add a new dimension to safety. With the help of **surveillance** and **integration** technology, the number of accidents will decrease and **equilibrium** will be maintained on the roads.

Moreover, it is also beneficial from an environmental perspective. By reducing fuel consumption and ensuring **ergonomic** design, this technology will make transportation more sustainable. Although there are questions about **retrofitting** and **viability**, the **proliferation** of technology will make it more **eminent**.
